pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, June 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, June 18, 2016:

Scarborough, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Paddle The Rouge event and will deliver brief remarks.

Rouge Beach Park
195 Rouge Hills Drive
Scarborough, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks

Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
